translations: n.[天] 星盘；天体观测仪

phrs.translation: 星盘, 等高仪, 天体观测仪, 观象仪
阿斯特罗莱布礁, 阿斯特莱布礁, 阿斯托拉贝礁
摆式星盘, 垂摆等高仪

sentences.sentence: The astrolabe had long been the primary instrument for navigation, having been introduced in the eleventh century.
sentences.translation: 自11世纪星盘被引入以来，它一直都是航海的重要工具。

sentences.sentence: Mariners were also able to fix their latitude by using an instrument called astrolabe.
sentences.translation: 海员们还可使用星盘这种仪器确定纬度。

sentences.sentence: On the astrolabe, an off - centered circle represents the orbit of the sun - the ecliptic.
sentences.translation: 在星盘上，一个偏心的圆代表了太阳的运行轨道——黄道。
